DOC.brief_summary: This study compared the effects of dairy products, including milk and yogurt, with different amounts of proteins on responses of appetite, glucose and insulin and on food intake at a meal served 120 minutes later in healthy adult male individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Protein Concentrations in Yogurt and Satiety, Food Intake and Glycemia in Healthy Men
DOC.criteria: Age: 2030 years Body mass index: 20 and 24.9 kg/m2 Breakfast skippers, Smokers, Dieters, Individuals with lactoseintolerance or who are allergic to milk, Individuals with gastrointestinal problems and Individuals with diabetes or other metabolic diseases
